name: PadCloud
overview:
We help our customers to enrich and “gold-plate” their existing documents and publications quick and easy and enable or create native apps to deliver documents and publications safe and secure to iPad, iPhones and other mobile devices.

With the PadCloud you can deliver documents and publications – “gold-plated” or the simple PDF - to iPad, iPhone & other mobile devices. It does not matter whether you want to distribute user manuals, sales presentations, surveys, financial reports or shareholder information and it does not matter whether you want to send it to 20, 200 or 2,000 recipients. With the PadCloud you can deliver these materials to iPad, iPhone & other mobile devices - safely and securely.
